summary: This mod is intended to expand upon Skyrim\'s late-game gameplay. Many enemies in the game do not have levels higher than 25-30, which means that the game\'s difficulty can drop after level 35 - right when the player is getting strongest! This mod adds a large quantity of enemies to Skyrim\'s autoleveling system for level 25+.
descriptionHtml:
This mod is intended to expand upon Skyrim\'s late-game gameplay. Many enemies in the game do not have levels higher than 25-30, which means that the game\'s difficulty can drop after level 35 - right when the player is getting strongest! This mod adds a large quantity of enemies to Skyrim\'s autoleveling system for level 25+.  As seen on the Skyrim Workshop: http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=11389

With these higher level enemies available in most regions, the game will continue to be a challenge in the later levels without needing to increase the game\'s difficulty setting.

If you like this mod, please give it a thumbs up! If you really love it, you can donate here: http://tiny.cc/kiasv

Release notes:

Version 0.8:
- Removed \'Void Dragon\'. This mod now has full compatibility with Deadly Dragons or any other dragon mod.

Version 0.7:
- Slightly increased damage of level 45+ Melee Bandits, which was capped by 100 Weapon Skill.
- Added Bandits from levels 50-60.

Version 0.6:
- Added Dwarven automatons from levels 30 to 50.
- Added Falmer from levels 40 to 50.

Version 0.5:
- Added Trolls from levels 30 to 50.
- Added Frostbite Spiders from level 20 to 30.
- Added Chaurus from levels 30 to 40.

Version 0.4:
- Changed mod name to \'Enhanced High-Level Gameplay\' to accurately reflect what the mod does.
- Added Bandits from levels 40-50.
- Added a level 60 dragon, the \'Void Dragon\'. These will start to show up around player level 54.

Version 0.3:
- Added Draugrs from level 40 to 60, \'Draugr Demigod\'.
- Added Giants from level 40 to 60.

Version 0.2:
- Added Bears from levels 20 to 50.
- Added Wolves from levels 10 to 30.
- Added higher level Bandit Bosses, up to level 38.
- Fixed an issue with Bandit Wizards, they will now appear.

Version 0.1:
- Added Bandits from 30-40, \'Bandit Elite\'. For reference, Skyrim\'s current maximum level Bandit is 25.
author: Eric
